description:

➢My Website: https://bardscraft.wixsite.com/craft
➢Support the Channel on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/bardscraft 
➢or donate Paint Funds: https://www.paypal.me/lsjoman
          -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I'm set up as an Amazon Affiliate in some regions. Especially to make it easier for new crafters I have linked to products I use and/or recommend. Any purchases through affiliate links grant me a small commission, that is a good way to support the channel at no extra cost. More recommended products on my website.
